modShortDescription: This mod increases the crafting queue from 4 slots to 12. Scrap everything!
modDescription:
This mod increases the crafting queue from 4 [slots](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-more-slots/) to 12\. Scrap everything!

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-12CraftQueue)** for A20  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-12CraftQueue)** for A19

If you appreciate KhaineGBâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).
